PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xE05030Be sure to get the following for your Grace Divine blessing to work! ^xE05030^xC8C8C81.^7 ^xE05030Anomalous Increased Duration^7^7 (Linked to Grace and with max level/quality) ^xE05030^xC8C8C82. ^7^xE05030Divergent Inspiration^7^7 (Linked to Grace and with max level/quality) ^xC8C8C83.^7 ^xFFFF7710% reduced mana cost of skills^7 from anywhere. (you can get it on rings, jewels or the passive tree) ^xC8C8C84. ^7A flask with the crafted mod "^x8888FF25% reduced Mana Cost of Skills during Effect^7"
This will bring the mana cost down to 99% (it should cost 16-20 mana then)
^xD02090For more information check these links!^7 Build Guide: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FPBaDFfdDx4 Armor Stacker Compendium: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y3flah0ObSS3lzXEFv_9cmw0SzdWkJucZ_EddwK4eJM/edit?usp=sharing
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@Bigdaddytehpwnerereerr Discord: https://discord.gg/cvSUVBvFX2 Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/ooohbigdaddy
